ing: 2 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles ginger ale
des: "Ginger ale and lemonade punch is an easy drink to make an is great at any party! You can use a cake pan to make an ice sculpture for your drink. When the water freezes, put the cake pan in a bowl of hot water for a few seconds, then put the ice in the punch bowl."
ins: In a large punch bowl, combine the ginger ale, sugar, lemonade and ice. Stir to blend well and serve
